name: Iloilo River Port
description: Learn while loops! Keep driving while you haven't reached your destination.
starter_code:
# Use a while loop to keep going
while not car.is_at_destination():
    # Keep moving!
    pass
hints: A while loop repeats as long as the condition is True
Use 'not car.is_at_destination()' to loop until you arrive
Put car.go() inside the while loop
